column4: I need to refetch apache.  I'm running apt-get install apache2 and it says it's successful but it's not copying any files at all.  Anyone know what's wrong?
Anyone know why apt-get install apache isn't actually copying any new files?
is there any output to that command?
then it seems that the deb package may already be on your system
are you connected to the internet
yeah i have one but it doesn't work with linux.  says it detects a video card but crashes my system
probably won't have much luck then...
cry and cry till either you give up or they build a linux driver :p
shiza .. i have a sheevaplug on the way ... i need video output
what's wrong with the built ins?
